keywords_models.name: hidden
keywords_models.function: This unit can only be selected as a target unit by units within 20 cm.

keywords_models.name: fly
keywords_models.function: This unit can perform the "Fly" action up to the given distance.

keywords_models.name: move
keywords_models.function: This unit can perform the "Move" action up to the given distance.

keywords_models.name: brace
keywords_models.function: This unit can perform the "Brace" action.

keywords_models.name: score
keywords_models.function: This unit can perform the "Score objective" action.

keywords_models.name: teleportation
keywords_models.function: This unit can perform the "Setup teleportation" action.

keywords_weapons.name: heavy
keywords_weapons.function: Can only use this weapon when performing the "Critical attack" action.

keywords_weapons.name: precise
keywords_weapons.function: Units near the target unit cannot perform the "Block" action.

keywords_weapons.name: separate
keywords_weapons.function: When attacking with another weapon without "separate": Can also attack with this weapon during the attack action.
